Reviews.Content: usually dont bother writing reviews unless experience excellent opposite awful travel lot expect paying price range stayed hostels luxury hotels im pretty aware cant expect services cost stay silken diagonal absolutely stunned decided write review ok purpose barcelona visit primavera sound 2010 choosing hotel consideration location services due tough schedule relax busy nightlife silken choice 4 stars venue close subway station arrived staff friendly expect brought wine bottle opener instead suggested lobby bar privacy didnt care lot lobby bar supposed spend amount time reallyreally transparent windows street construction didnt ok check swimming pool stuff told outdoor closed didnt indoor pool pool shower disaster 3 taps shower tap bath tap jungle rain tap dont name position switch water runs 3 furthermore shower separated transparent glass matte ok stayed plan invite tired curtains 1st floor stunned construction site view street stay ill realized wasnt wrong morning tired fest forgot dnd sign door maid 12 woke apologized gone ok mistake trying break 1520 mins realized sleeping attempts worst left expect 4 star hotel absence internet cable connection wifi paid unpaid paid option didnt try leisure business trip password 24 hours email checks web god soooo slow 15 mins download file 5 mb imagine 21st century 4 star hotel neither drop decided write review resume hotel business traveller leaving coming late willing pay internet separately advert told pay itll faster allow check email didnt try close subway station shopping mall named glories ones willing time bcn reccomend hotel means overpriced missing valuable facilities touch vacation stay

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional Service with a few minor glitches”
Reviews.Author: thegoodluckclub
Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed silken diagonal barcelona february 26 march 3rd categorize experience staff silken extremely accommodating speaks english arrived 3 hours prior scheduled checkin time keys extra charge free internet access getting printout 24 hours network name password metro station glories close 4 stops city center clean design modern chic starting look bit dated especially enjoyed glassedin shower huge tub didnt figuring knobs water am guess americans probably ones issues likewise water getting floor stand tub enclosed major leakage bed firm id elsewhere pretty electronic blinds cool remember key slot lights ventilation bit puzzled despite overall pleasant experience letdowns walls silken extremely thin hear neighbors bodily functions conversations television selections etc comfortable stay terrible misfortune sick coughing loudly night 2 nights drunk banging angry elephant hear earplugs luckily 3 nights excellent sleep front desk staff happy switch secondly view silken special empty lots construction werent looking amazing view fazed sightseeing center finally day happened 4th floor hallway smelt worst odor raw sewage human feces exposed mixed pinesol maid cover guest ill wrong pipes am foul resolved 18 hours smelled luckily freshsmelling short id probably recommend silken couples modern hip fresh mobility issues traditional tastes desire luxury stay boutique hotel barri gotic pay times
